name: Spacebullar
description:
AS AN EMPLOYEE AT SPACEBULLAR...

It is your duty to deliver our delicious synthetic Spacebullar meatballs to all marked locations across the universe. Be aware of cosmic dangers to keep your ship (company property) intact. Act quickly and first and foremost work together as a team.

========================================================================

INSTRUCTIONS

Instructions on how to play the game are in the download section.
There is also a video showing those instructions

HOW TO INSTALL/PLAY

To play the game, download Spacebullar (for LInux or Windows) and unzip the file.
Start the Game with the executable ("SpaceJob").

Play with Controller or Mouse and Keyboard
